latestVersion.termsOfAccess: These data should be obtained from the Population Studies Center at the University of Michigan.

fields.value: Census of Population of China, 1982: 1% 1-in-100 Sample (M375V1)

authorName.value: China Statistical Information and Consultancy Service Center.

authorAffiliation.value: University of Illinois at Chicago. China Statistics Archives.

dsDescriptionValue.value: This is the third national population census of China, collected in 1982.  The data were supplied to the distribution center by the National Bureau of Statistics of China. Topics include marital status, occupation, education, nationality, gender, household registration status, education level, industry, status of non-working population, number of children born/number survived, children born in household since 1981. Household level topic include type of household, number of people, number of births, and number of deaths. The dataset is a 1% sample of the population enumerated in 1982.
